# gux-panel-footer-position

Provided positioning for the Panel Footer component. Has three positions: Left, Right and Middle. Positioning to be
used with buttons.


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                | Type                            | Default  |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------- | ------------------------------- | -------- |
| `position` | `position` | Position of the component. | `"left" \| "middle" \| "right"` | `'left'` |
